Camera.Flash:: Laser AF, color spectrum sensor, LED flash, panorama, HDR
Camera.Second camera:: 48 MP, f/2.1, 93mm (periscope telephoto), PDAF, OIS, 4x optical zoom

Design.Materials:: Glass front, aluminum alloy frame, fiber-reinforced plastic back
Design.Biometrics:: Face ID, fingerprint (side-mounted), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, barometer, compass
Design.Resistance:: IP68/IP69 dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 6m for 30 min)

Battery.Charging::
100W wired
80W wireless
20W reverse wireless
18W reverse wired

Display.Features:: Face ID, fingerprint (side-mounted), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, barometer, compass

Connectivity & Features.Sensors:: Face ID, fingerprint (side-mounted), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, barometer, compass
Connectivity & Features.Location:: GPS (L1+L5), GLONASS (L1), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a+B2b), GALILEO (E1+E5a+E5b), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC
